title: Kenosha Unrest in 2020 Haunts Tight Wisconsin Governor’s Race
description: Bitterness over looting and destruction that followed the police shooting of Jacob Blake could help tip a governor’s race in the direction of Republicans.
dc:creator: Julie Bosman
media:description: Gov. Tony Evers, a Democrat, needs a strong showing in Kenosha, Wis., traditionally a Democratic stronghold, in an election that could be decided by only a handful of votes.
